import React, {useEffect} from 'react'; import "./CartPage.scss"; import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux'; import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; import { removeFromCart, toggleCartQty, getCartTotal, clearCart } from '../../store/cartSlice'; import {formatPrice} from "../../utils/helpers"; import Pagination from '../../components/Pagination/Pagination'; const CartPage = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const {data: cartProducts, totalItems, totalAmount, deliveryCharge} = useSelector(state => state.cart); useEffect(() => { dispatch(getCartTotal()); }, [dispatch]); const emptyCartMsg =

No items found!

; const [currentPage, setCurrentPage] = useState(1); const cartItemsPerPage = 5; // Number of cart items to display per page const startIndex = (currentPage - 1) * cartItemsPerPage; const endIndex = startIndex + cartItemsPerPage; const displayedCartItems = cartProducts.slice(startIndex, endIndex); return (
  • Cart

My Cart

{ cartProducts.length === 0 ? emptyCartMsg : (
{ cartProducts.map(cartProduct => (
{cartProduct.title}
Qty:
{cartProduct.quantity}
Price : {formatPrice(cartProduct.price)}.00
Sub Total: {formatPrice(cartProduct.totalPrice)}
)) }
Order Summary
  • Selected {totalItems} items(s) Price {formatPrice(totalAmount)}
  • Discount -  {formatPrice(0)}
  • Delivery Cost + {formatPrice(deliveryCharge/100)}
Grand Total: {formatPrice(totalAmount + deliveryCharge)}
) }
) } export default CartPage
